comments:
I just updated to the latest CDT (3.1.0.200605290500) and now I get plenty of
the following exception during indexing:

I had to truncate the stack trace (due to length restrictions on comments) but
you can see it's a recursive loop.

instead of creating a new bug entry I just reopen this one. Hope that's OK
Lothar
